input.sentences: the rocks came in many sizes and colors .
we took a grand picture of the vent .
away from the sun was land and sand .
we found this piece of vegetation in the sand .
before we left | i made my mark with my foot in the sand .
output.sentences: There were so many sizes and colors of rocks.
We saw a grand vent and took a picture.
The sun glistened off the sand. The land was beautiful.
As we walked, we found vegetation in the sand, just a piece.
As we came back, we found a foot mark in the sand to our left.
